column1: JINYA Ramen Bar - Houston////Hi Victoria - Thank you for taking the time to give our restaurant a review. We appreciate your kind words
column2: and your constructive feedback. I will speak with our chefs about your observation regarding our broths. Please know that we're always happy to remake the order for you in the event that our chefs prepared your dish incorrectly. Thank you
column5: and we hope to serve you again in the near future.
